unified_platform_description: A unified platform for real-time health reporting, intelligent disease monitoring, and rapid alert dissemination across the North Eastern Region.
dedicated_platform_description: A dedicated platform for every stakeholder in public health.
asha_description: The frontline of community health. Report cases, monitor village health, and receive instant alerts.
ngo_description: Partners in progress. Conduct surveys, manage awareness campaigns, and collaborate on public health initiatives.
clinic_description: The core of medical care. Access regional health data, report critical cases, and coordinate with health officials.
process_description: From data collection to life-saving predictions.
data_collection_description: ASHA Workers, NGOs, Clinics, IVR, and IoT sensors provide real-time data from the field.
rule_based_filtering_description: A local model processes incoming data, identifying and flagging potential anomalies instantly.
early_warnings_description: Automated alerts are sent back to frontline workers and saved to the central database for tracking.
llm_powered_prediction_description: The Ministry's AI analyzes patterns to predict potential outbreaks and suggests preventative actions.
high_level_alerts_description: Ministry officials review AI-driven insights and broadcast verified, high-impact alerts to the entire region.
login_description: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
register_description: Fill in your details to create an account.
name: Name
please_fill_email_password: Please fill in both email and password
arunachal_pradesh_fact: Known for its stunning natural beauty and diverse indigenous tribes.
assam_fact: Famous for its tea plantations and the one-horned rhinoceros.
manipur_fact: Known as the 'Jewel of India' with a rich cultural heritage.
meghalaya_fact: The 'Abode of Clouds', famous for its living root bridges and heavy rainfall.
mizoram_fact: Land of the 'Highlanders', known for its lush landscapes and vibrant festivals.
nagaland_fact: Known for its warrior tribes, vibrant festivals, and rich cultural traditions.
sikkim_fact: Home to Kangchenjunga, the third highest mountain in the world, and known for its pristine beauty.
tripura_fact: Known for its rich cultural heritage, including palaces and temples.
click_village_for_summary: Click on a village to view the detailed AI-generated summary and recommendations.
select_village_to_see_summary: Select a village to see the summary.
select_village_sidebar_details: Select a village from the sidebar to see its details
high_fever_outbreak_message: Multiple cases of high fever reported in Village_1.
water_contamination_message: Reports of contaminated drinking water in Village_5.
